Package progetto.network

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IEnforce
    This is the class that must be extended to add a functionality it's up to the implemented transport mechanism tu ensure that it can be transported.
    INetworkClient
    This is the interface that must be implemented by a message transport layer to allow ClientConnection to behave correctly
    INetworkClientFactory  
    INetworkHandler
    The server side implementation of a message transport layer must implement this interface.
    INetworkModule  
    INetworkModuleFactory  
    IRoomRequest
    This is the class that must be extended to add a functionality it's up to the implemented transport mechanism tu ensure that it can be transported.
    ISync
    This interface is used to connect the network to whatever we want to keep synchronized across the net.
    ISyncFactory
    Class provided to the server to be able to spawn a synch object every time it's needed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractINetowrkClientTest  
    AbstractMessageExchangeTest  
    AbstractNetworkTest  
    AbstractNetworkTestStub  
    AbstractRoom
    An abstract room is the class that holds the connections.
    AbstractServerRequest
    message that is executed at server level.
    AbstractStandardTest  
    AbstractSynchronizationTest  
    ClientConnection
    Client connection is the object encapsulating the the INetworkClient implementations that provide to the client all the method needed to communicate with the server.
    EncapsulationRoomRequest
    Encapsulate a server request in a room requests, so that it can be carried over to the higher level
    FetchMyIDRequest
    Extension of AbstractServerRequest used to ask to the server to resend the player id.
    FetchServerStateRequest
    Extension of AbstractServerRequest used to ask the server to send the room state again.
    JoinRoomRequest
    Request that is sent when the player wishes to switch room.
    NetworkServer
    A network server is the class that handles the entire state of the network on the server
    NetworkSettings  
    PickChairRoomRequest
    Request that is used to try to get a particular chair inside a server room
    Player
    A Player is a object holding the in room info about a player.
    PlayerView
    A player view is the collection of relevant information that regards a player.
    Room
    The extension of Abstract room that is able to keep the sync object synchronized.
    RoomCreationRequest
    Request sent every time a client wishes to create a new room on the server.
    RoomView  
    SendPrivateMessageRoomRequest
    Request sent when the player wishes to send a message to another player inside the room
    SendSyncStringRoomRequest
    Request sent when the player desires to make a modification to the sync object inside that room.
    ServerConnection
    The class server connection is the class that uses the various implementation of INetworkHandler to perform the room and server level behaviour.
    ServerState
    This class holds all the information at room level that are need to the server.
    ServerStateTransferEnforce
    This enforce is sent to the client when the server wishes to notify that the server state is changed.
    ServerStateView
    A representation of the server state that can be sent across the network.
    SetPlayerInfoEnforce
    And enforce that is sent when the server wants to notify that the player id is changed.
    SetReadyRoomRequest
    A request sent every time the client wishes to change his ready status
    SetRoomInfoEnforce
    Forces the client to update his room info
    SyncCheckEnforce
    forces the player to check if his sync object is still in sync
    SyncFactoryStub  
    SyncStateEnforce
    forces the player ro reset the sync object state and to add all commands
    SyncStringEnforce
    Forces the player to append a sync string command to his sync object
    SyncStub  
    TestEsempio  
    WaitingRoom
    An implementation of abstract room that is used to hold all the player that have joined the server but have not joined a room yet.
